law.text: At the time of effecting any such surplus lines insurance, the broker shall execute an affidavit in form prescribed or accepted by the commissioner setting forth facts from which it can be determined whether such insurance was eligible for export under KRS 304.10-040. The broker shall file this affidavit with the commissioner in the manner and form as prescribed by the commissioner through administrative regulation.
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 1091, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 2004 Ky. Acts ch. 157, sec. 5, effective July 13, 2004. -- Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 123, sec. 7, effective July 15, 1982. -- Created 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 301, subtit. 10, sec. 5, effective June 18, 1970.
